original_text: Many people were giving their gifts for the temple. There was a box for money there. People threw their coins into it. Jesus sat near the box and he watched them. Many rich people put a lot of money into the box.
korean_text: 예수께서 헌금함을 대하여 앉으사 무리가 어떻게 헌금함에 돈 넣는가를 보실새 여러 부자는 많이 넣는데

sentences.original_text: Many people were giving their gifts for the temple.
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 성전을 위해 헌금을 드리고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: There was a box for money there.
People threw their coins into it.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 동전을 그 함에 던져 넣었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Many rich people put a lot of money into the box.
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 부자들이 많은 돈을 함에 넣었습니다.
